content.question: As part of his therapy, Ralph makes an anxiety hierarchy for his therapist. At the bottom of the hierarchy, Ralph indicates the act of looking at a photograph of an insect. At the top of the hierarchy, Ralph indicates a scenario in which an insect is actually crawling on his hand. Based on the anxiety hierarchy he made, Ralph is most likely displaying symptoms of

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
